attributes.action:
Create a Commonwealth Free Trade Zone
53 States POP:2.4billion GDP:$14trillion
attributes.additional_details:
The main barriers are now gone.  The UK is leaving the EU and able to set its own tariffs.  The UK is once again wealthy and a large importer, and India has a new government that is open to trade.  The UK has an imperative to create a replacement to the EU, and is in a humble position needing this to happen.

India has a strategy of Make in India, with Africa, Australia and Canada exporting the natural resources that India needs to convert into goods. 

London can provide the required finance
attributes.background:
Brexit, requires an alternative to the EU.  A Commonwealth Free Trade Zone would be better than the EU since 50% of the population of the Commonwealth are under 30 and the GDP is rapidly growing.

This would make 1/3 of the world richer, and benefit the entire world.
